ygData.subject: Re: yo
ygData.msgSnippet: Um, you get three screen resolutions using F10. You get Full screen, the standard (solid chat and info boxes), and transparent boxes view. Forget what all of
ygData.messageBody:
Um, you get three screen resolutions using F10.
You get Full screen, the standard (solid chat and
info boxes), and transparent boxes view. Forget what
all of those are called. I do most everything in the
transparent boxes view; hit esc, and you'll get a message
that says that "transparent polygons are now off," or
something. Then you can see through the boxes, almost as
good as full screen (no boxes) view.<br><br>Kharlisht
of Kaladim<br>17th season
rogue<br>Drinal<br>Specializing in backstabs, corpse recoveries, and Butcherblock
Mountains guide service
